name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug or unexpected behavior
title: ''
labels: bug
assignees: ''
---

**Describe the bug**
A clear description of what the bug is.

**To reproduce**
Steps or command to reproduce:
```
netgrep ...
```

**Expected behavior**
What you expected to happen.

**Actual behavior**
What actually happened. Include any error output.

**Environment**
- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu 24.04]
- Rust version: [e.g. 1.91.0]
- netgrep version: [e.g. 0.1.0]
- libpcap version: [e.g. 1.10.4]
- Capture method: [live / pcap file]

**Additional context**
Any other relevant information (pcap samples, screenshots, etc.).
